section.heading: Rules.
section.text: The Mayor, pursuant to [] subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 106 of Close Relative Caregiver Subsidy Pilot Program Establishment Emergency Amendment Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-84, July 16, 2019, 66 DCR 8274).

For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 106 of Close Relative Caregiver Subsidy Pilot Program Establishment Temporary Amendment Act of 2019 (D.C. Law 23-25, Oct. 24, 2019, 66 DCR 12081).
